application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 8 (Construction Traffic Management Plan (CTMP)) and 10 (Trees and landscaping) of planning permission 24/01980 (Remodelling and refurbishment including the construction of basement with front and side lightwells; erection of single storey rear extension and replacement of side infill to ground floor; replacement of sash windows; alterations to existing windows; introduction of two rooflights to the closet wing; removal of render to rear facade to closet wing; refurbishment of existing dormer; replacement of the front boundary wall; creation of bin store to front garden; and alterations to the front and rear landscaping)
